title: Kalista Passive Becomes Unresponsive At 1.6 AS
body: The QofL change to her passive made it necessary to attack move to properly use her passive later in the game, otherwise 2/3 times the leap doesn't occur, and you just run through the aa animation with no movement. Do you intend to fix this in the next patch?

replies.body: Riot knows this and is working on a fix

> [{quoted}](name=Azteryz,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=RRm92fyT,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-18T19:30:31.862+0000)
>
> Riot knows this and is working on a fix

Yup! This is a known issue and we're working on it!
Also I can't jump over walls after Q. Is it that I'm unskilled or can I blame it on a bug? (please let it be the latter)
I heard it only works on REALLY skinny walls.

You should take into consideration that jump distance is higher if you jump backwards(Although I still have no clue where that backwards is... Is it opposite from where the champion that you aa is? Or is it opposite from the direction you face before aa?)
"Backwards" is most likely away from your projectile.
Thankyou for letting us know your awesome :)
